LANTERN_GONE: Lantern appears not to be running anymore
UNEXPECTED_STATE_PROMPT: O Lantern está num estado inesperado. Tente atualizar, e se o problema persistir, tente sair e reinicie. Também pode tentar reinstalar o Lantern. Como último recurso, escolha Reiniciar e irá colocar o Lantern no seu estado original. Se comunicar qualquer informação adicional sobre o problema para os  criadores do Lantern, pode acelerar a sua resolução.
SETTINGS_UNLOCK_PROMPT: Insira a sua senha do Lantern para desbloquear as suas definições.
SETTINGS_LOAD_FAILURE_TITLE: Não foi possível carregar as Definições
SETTINGS_LOAD_FAILURE_PROMPT: Não foi possível carregar as suas definições. Tente de novo, e se o problema persistir, tente sair e reiniciar. E como último recurso, ao escolher Reiniciar irá repor o Lantern para o seu estado original. Se comunicar qualquer informação adicional sobre o problema para os criadores do Lantern pode acelerar a sua resolução.
TAG_LINE: Internet livre para toda a gente.
OR_IF_YOU_NEED: or if you need access to blocked sites:
INTERNET_REQUIRED: Por favor, conete à Internet para prosseguir.
WAIT_FOR_FRIEND_OR: Wait for a Lantern Friend to come online and give you access or
SPONSOR_NOW: sponsor your own Lantern Cloud Server to get access now.
CONNECTION_OFFLINE: A sua conexão à Internet parece estar desligada.
AUTHORIZE_PROMPT: Signing in with Google allows Lantern to connect you to users in your social network, and not just anyone.
AUTHORIZE_EXTRA: Connecting to only users in your social network makes Lantern more secure and harder to block.
EMAIL_USE: Your email address is kept private within your Lantern network and is used only for Lantern services. The only email Lantern will ever send you will be about important Lantern notifications, which you can unsubscribe from at any time.
INVITE_EMAIL: Remember to use the email address you were invited with, or ask your inviter to invite you again with a different address.
DIRECT_FROM_GOOGLE: You will be directed to Google to sign in. Lantern never stores or even sees your password.
NOT_INVITED_PROMPT: O utilizador que contactou, ainda não foi convidado para aderir ao Lantern.
SOMEONE_I_KNOW_INFO: Se o seu contacto é um utilizador reconhecido, ele ou ela deverão receber um mesagem de imediato com o conteúdo dos seu pedido.
LANTERN_DEVS_INFO: New users will be invited as fast as the network can accommodate them.
CONFIGURE_PROXIED_SITES: Edit the list below to contain the sites you’d like to access through Lantern.
PROXYING_ALL_WARNING: Lantern is currently set to proxy all traffic.
PROXYING_ALL_WARNING_EXPLANATION: Only proxying sites that are blocked makes Lantern faster and harder to block.
DISABLE_PROXY_ALL: Desativar o proxy para todo o tráfego
PROXIED_SITES_TIP: O conteúdo noutros sites incluídos nas páginas destes sites também irão ser "proxied" automaticamente.
PROXIED_SITES_WIKI_TIP_CONTINUED: for more sites you might like to add.
ERROR_ONE_REQUIRED: Pelo menos, é preciso um site.
ERROR_MAX_PROXIED_SITES_EXCEEDED: Maximum number of proxied sites exceeded
FINISHED_PROMPT_GIVE: Your connection is now ready to be shared through your Lantern social network.
FINISHED_PROMPT_GET: You will now be able to access your proxied sites through your Lantern social network.
AUTOREPORT_PROMPT: Securely report anonymous usage statistics to contribute to Lantern
LANTERN_FRIENDS_EXP_INTRO: Add friends you trust to share an internet connection. Lantern will connect you to users up to 4 degrees away from you in your Lantern network.
NO_FRIENDS: Atualmente, não tem amigos do Lantern.
RETRIEVING_NINVITES: A obter o número dos convites ...
ADD_FRIENDS_PROMPT: Add friends by Google account address
ENTER_VALID_EMAIL: Insira um endereço de e-mail válido
ONLY_FREE_FRIENDS: You have reached your friend limit. You can only add friends who don’t count against your friend limit.
SUGGESTED_BECAUSE_RUNNING: Suggested because this contact is a Lantern user.
SUGGESTED_BECAUSE_FRIENDED_YOU: Suggested because this user added you as a Lantern Friend.
SUGGESTED_FRIEND_WARNING: Adding people you don’t trust increases the risk of getting Lantern blocked by censors.
CAN_ADD_NO_MORE_FRIENDS: You have reached your friend limit.
FREE_TO_FRIEND:
Friending this account would
not count against your friend limit.
NOT_FREE_TO_FRIEND:
Friending this account would
count against your friend limit.
REACHED_AND_NOT_FREE_TO_FRIEND:
You have reached your friend
limit. This account can’t be friended.
CAN_STILL_ADD_BACK: You’ll only be able to add friends who don’t count against your limit.
AUTO_START: Executar o Lantern automaticamente no arranque do sistema
SHOW_FRIEND_PROMPTS: Prompt to friend contacts running Lantern
NO_AUTOREPORT_WARNING: Your usage will not contribute to global totals.
ENABLE_AUTOREPORT_SUGGESTION: Ative a comunicação automática nas Definições para ter a sua utilização inglobada nos totais globais
BETA_STATEMENT: Lantern is beta software, which means it hasn’t yet been tested enough to be ready for large-scale distribution. Thank you for your help testing Lantern, and for understanding wherever it’s still rough around the edges. Also remember that Lantern is pending external security audit and thorough peer review within the technical community. Please only use Lantern if you understand your risks.
GET_INVOLVED_CONTINUED: page to find out more about ways to help.
LICENSE_STATEMENT:
This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL) as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. The full text of version 3 of the GPL can be found in the file LICENSE.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA.
PRIVACY_STATEMENT: Lantern takes the responsibility of providing internet access very seriously. We have an explicit interest in keeping any personally identifiable information routed through Lantern servers and clients limited, secret, and ephemeral. All Lantern software and infrastructure has been configured with strong security protections and data expungement policies in accordance with that interest. For more information, please see https://github.com/getlantern/lantern/wiki/Privacy.
UPDATE_AVAILABLE_PROMPT: Está disponível uma nova versão do Lantern!
UPDATE_PROMPT: Por favor, atualize agora para se certificar que tem as últimas funções e melhoramentos .
CONTACT_PRELUDE: The Lantern documentation and user forums are the best places to search, request, and provide information appropriate for public access. Private messages can be submitted securely through this form.
SPONSOR_PROMPT_GET: If you notice too often that not enough friends are sharing access when you need it, you can sponsor a Lantern Cloud Server, which can provide access to you and your friends who need it 24/7.
SPONSOR_PROMPT_GIVE: If you would like to provide access even while you’re not running Lantern, you can sponsor a Lantern Cloud Server, which will provide access 24/7.
SPONSOR_CLOUD_PROXY: Patrocine o Servidor Cloud do Lantern
SPONSOR_TO_CONTINUE_TITLE: Para continuar, patrocine um Servidor Cloud do Lantern
SPONSOR_TO_CONTINUE_PROMPT: No available access points known. To get access with this version of Lantern now, you can sponsor a Lantern Cloud Server to provide access to you and your friends who need it 24/7.
VIEW_WAYS_TO_GET_INVOLVED: view all ways to get involved
GIVE_MODE_FORBIDDEN_PROMPT: Your internet connection appears to be coming from a censoring country. Giving access through this connection could be undesirable for other users. You can run Lantern in Give Access mode if you connect to the internet from outside a censoring country.
CONTINUE_IN_GET_MODE: Continuar no Modo de Acesso Obter
CONFIRM_RESET_PROMPT: Resetting Lantern will clear all saved information since it was set up.
BACKEND_ADDED_FRIEND: Added %s. If this account is not yet in the private beta, it will be invited upon admin approval.
BACKEND_CHECKING_INVITE: A verificar para o acesso ao Lantern ...
BACKEND_INVITE_FAILED: Cannot send invite because we appear to no longer be logged in to Google Talk. Are you still connected to the Internet?
NO_PROXIES: Connection failure: Can’t reach any users in your Lantern network who are giving access.
BACKEND_NO_PROXIES: Connection failure: Can’t reach any users in your Lantern network who are giving access.
BACKEND_MANUAL_PROXY: Because you are using manual proxy configuration, you may have to restart your browser for your updated proxied sites list to take effect.
BACKEND_CONTACT_THANK_YOU: Message sent. Thank you for contacting Team Lantern.
BACKEND_CONTACT_ERROR: Error sending message. Please check your connection and try again.
BACKEND_SETUP: Now that you’re all set up, take a minute to explore the Lantern global network map, or just return to whatever you’d like to do next. You can always get back here through the Lantern icon in the %s.
BACKEND_ICONLOC_MENUBAR: menu bar at the top of the screen
BACKEND_ICONLOC_SYSTRAY: system tray at the bottom right of your screen
BACKEND_ICONLOC_UNKNOWN: (unsupported OS: Lantern icon may not be visible)
BACKEND_NO_CONFIG: No configuration file found. Lantern cannot start! Please notify the Lantern developers at team@getlantern.org or at the Lantern user forums
BACKEND_DO_NOT_SHOW: Do not show this message again.
BACKEND_MANUAL_NETWORK_PROMPT: Lantern was unable to automatically configure your network. Would you like to try manually forwarding a port on your router? Lantern can automatically open the configuration page, and you will need you user name and password. Please forward external port 4437 to internal port 4437.
BACKEND_BROWSER_ERROR: There was an unknown error opening your browser.
GS: Georgia do Sul e Ilhas Sandwich do Sul
SH: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
